Sentencas: A multiscale model has been used to optimize the microstructure of a classical hydrogen electrode made of nickel and yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni-8YSZ).
Titulo: Numerical microstructural optimization for the hydrogen electrode of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: For this purpose, a 3D reconstruction of a reference electrode has been obtained by X-ray nano-holotomography.
Titulo: Numerical microstructural optimization for the hydrogen electrode of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Then, a large dataset of synthetic microstructures has been generated around this reference with the truncated Gaussian random field method, varying the ratio Ni/8YSZ and the Ni particle size.
Titulo: Numerical microstructural optimization for the hydrogen electrode of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: All the synthetic microstructures have been introduced in a multiscale modeling approach to analyze the impact of the microstructure on the electrode and cell responses.
Titulo: Numerical microstructural optimization for the hydrogen electrode of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The local electrode polarization resistance in the hydrogen electrode, as well as the complete cell impedance spectra, have been computed for the different microstructures.
Titulo: Numerical microstructural optimization for the hydrogen electrode of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: A significant performance improvement was found when decreasing the Ni particle size distribution.
Titulo: Numerical microstructural optimization for the hydrogen electrode of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Moreover, an optimum has been identified in terms of electrode composition allowing the minimization of the cell polarization resistance.
Titulo: Numerical microstructural optimization for the hydrogen electrode of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The same methodology has been also applied to assess the relevance of graded electrodes.
Titulo: Numerical microstructural optimization for the hydrogen electrode of solid oxide cells

Sentencas: All these results allow a better understanding of the precise role of microstructure on cell performances and provide useful guidance for cell manufacturing.
Titulo: Numerical microstructural optimization for the hydrogen electrode of solid oxide cells
